resources.string: This is what we see when we start the app, we can press any of these buttons above, or use the player below with previous listening setting song
Here we have songs sorted by album in alphabetical order, also we can use player below or navigate between categories
Here we have songs sorted by artist in alphabetical order, also we can use player below or navigate between categories
Here is were we have our custom order of songs, also we can use player below or navigate between categories
Here we have songs sorted by song in alphabetical order, also we can use player below or navigate between categories
